verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Stay with me Lord, Thou knowest how Thee I can forget
Stay with me Lord, Thou knowest that without Thy strength I fall
Stay with me Lord, for without Thee my fervour fails
Stay with me Lord – Thou art my light
Stay with me Lord – Thou art my life

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Stay with me Lord, Stay with me Lord
Stay with me Lord, Stay with me Lord
Resta con me, ora e sempre Signore
Resta con me, ora e sempre Signore

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Stay with me Lord, how easily I abandon Thee
Stay with me Lord, Thou knowest I have such need of Thee
Stay with me Lord, though my soul is poor abide with me
Stay with me Lord – Thou knowest I'm weak
Stay with me Lord – Show me Thy will

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Stay with me Lord, that I may always stay with Thee
Stay with me Lord, that I may love Thee more and more
Stay with me Lord, let me hear Thy voice and follow Thee
Stay with me Lord - tis Thee I seek
Stay with me Lord - tis Thee I seek
